title: The Matrix Awakens
description: A testing video that explores key themes from The Matrix through iconic quotes, presented in three scenes with progressive visual storytelling to simulate an awakening journey.

scenes.title: The Choice
scenes.description: Introduce the concept of choice between illusion and reality using the famous red pill/blue pill dilemma.
narrative_beats: Present the blue pill as a path to continued ignorance.
Contrast it with the red pill leading to truth and uncertainty.
visual_ideas: Display two Text objects representing 'Blue Pill' and 'Red Pill' with pill-shaped Circle graphics next to them, fading in sequentially.
Use a simple graph or axis to show 'Illusion' vs 'Reality' paths diverging.

scenes.title: The System
scenes.description: Explain the Matrix as a controlling system and its impact on humanity.
narrative_beats: Describe the Matrix as a pervasive system enslaving minds.
Highlight the dependency of people on the system and their resistance to change.
visual_ideas: Create a flowchart using Arrow and Text elements showing 'System' at the center connected to 'Businessmen', 'Teachers', etc., as nodes.
Animate a network of connected dots (Dots) representing minds, with some highlighting as 'Enemies' via color changes.

scenes.title: The Awakening
scenes.description: Conclude with the idea of freeing the mind and personal responsibility for awakening.
narrative_beats: Acknowledge the shared thought of resistance.
Emphasize that true freedom requires walking through the door oneself.
visual_ideas: Show a door graphic (Rectangle with handle) that opens, revealing a new scene.
Use progressive Text reveals for key phrases, with a background of scrolling code-like lines (using Line or Tex for matrix-style text).
